about_the_game:
The soundtrack features 12 atmospheric tracks composed by Grimlore Games inhouse composer Bastian Kieslinger in mp3 and flac format.

Enjoy the music of SpellForce 3: Fallen God now on your favorite music player or directly played by Steam.
